description: Polygon features representing the boundaries for all rezonings adopted since January 1, 2002 (STATUS = "Adopted") and current proposed rezonings (STATUS = "Certified"). Selected city-initiated text amendments to the Zoning Resolution since 2002 that have discrete geographical boundaries may be included.

name: Bronx Rezoned 2002
